data.name: S.H.I.E.L.D. Security
data.description: A non-lethal combat specialist with a protective shield and a baton that stuns opponents.

starItems.name: S.H.I.E.L.D. Security
starItems.description: A non-lethal combat specialist with a protective shield and a baton that stuns opponents.

1.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>70%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color>.

2.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>100%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color>.

3.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>130%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color>.

4.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>160%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color>.

5.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>200%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color>.

6.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>230%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color>.

7.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>270%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color>.

1.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>90%</color> Piercing. If target has <color=#fff568>Slow</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Stun</color>.
Bonus attack for <color=#86e619>70%</color> Piercing.

2.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>140%</color> Piercing. If target has <color=#fff568>Slow</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Stun</color>.
Bonus attack for <color=#86e619>120%</color> Piercing.

3.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>180%</color> Piercing. If target has <color=#fff568>Slow</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Stun</color>.
Bonus attack for <color=#86e619>160%</color> Piercing.

4.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>230%</color> Piercing. If target has <color=#fff568>Slow</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Stun</color>.
Bonus attack for <color=#86e619>210%</color> Piercing.

5.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>270%</color> Piercing. If target has <color=#fff568>Slow</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Stun</color>.
Bonus attack for <color=#86e619>250%</color> Piercing.

6.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>320%</color> Piercing. If target has <color=#fff568>Slow</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Stun</color>.
Bonus attack for <color=#86e619>300%</color> Piercing.

7.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>370%</color> Piercing. If target has <color=#fff568>Slow</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Stun</color>.
Bonus attack for <color=#86e619>350%</color> Piercing.

1.description:
When an ally drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health, gain <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>. If that ally is Nick Fury or a <color=#fff568>S.H.I.E.L.D. MINION</color>, also gain <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>.
On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>, if that ally is Agent Coulson, also gain <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>.

Gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Block chance.
1.nextUpgrade:
For each Nick Fury or <color=#fff568>S.H.I.E.L.D. MINION</color> ally, gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Block chance
On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>, if Agent Coulson is an ally, gain an additional +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Block chance

2.description:
When an ally drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health, gain <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>. If that ally is Nick Fury or a <color=#fff568>S.H.I.E.L.D. MINION</color>, also gain <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>.
On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>, if that ally is Agent Coulson, also gain <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>.

Gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Block chance + <color=#86e619>10%</color> Block chance for each Nick Fury or <color=#fff568>S.H.I.E.L.D. MINION</color> ally.
On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>, if Agent Coulson is an ally, gain an additional +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Block chance.

3.description:
When an ally drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health, gain <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>. If that ally is Nick Fury or a <color=#fff568>S.H.I.E.L.D. MINION</color>, also gain <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>.
On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>, if that ally is Agent Coulson, also gain <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>.

Gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Block chance + <color=#86e619>10%</color> Block chance for each Nick Fury or <color=#fff568>S.H.I.E.L.D. MINION</color> ally.
On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>, if Agent Coulson is an ally, gain an additional +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Block chance.
Gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Block amount.

4.description:
When an ally drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health, gain <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>. If that ally is Nick Fury or a <color=#fff568>S.H.I.E.L.D. MINION</color>, also gain <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>.
On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>, if that ally is Agent Coulson, also gain <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>.

Gain +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Block chance + <color=#86e619>10%</color> Block chance for each Nick Fury or <color=#fff568>S.H.I.E.L.D. MINION</color> ally.
On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>, if Agent Coulson is an ally, gain an additional +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Block chance.
Gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Block amount.

5.description:
When an ally drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health, gain <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>. If that ally is Nick Fury or a <color=#fff568>S.H.I.E.L.D. MINION</color>, also gain <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>.
On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>, if that ally is Agent Coulson, also gain <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>.

Gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Block chance + <color=#86e619>10%</color> Block chance for each Nick Fury or <color=#fff568>S.H.I.E.L.D. MINION</color> ally.
On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>, if Agent Coulson is an ally, gain an additional +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Block chance.
Gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Block amount.
